long_description: With a cylindrical lens for great peripheral vision, the Von Zipper Feenom snow goggles offer style and performance for your epic days on the mountain. Olive Satin Sin frame comes with persimmon-tinted Persimmon Chrome lens which offers 25% variable light transmission (VLT) that works best in sunny to partly cloudy light. Spaceglaze Red frame comes with a Bronze Pink Chrome lens, which offers a bronze tint and 22.5% VLT for sunny to partly cloudy light conditions. Spaceglaze Teal frame comes with a bronze-tinted Lunar Chrome lens, which offers 22% VLT that works best in sunny to partly cloudy light conditions. Double-layer cylindrical polycarbonate lens minimizes distortion and offers extended peripheral vision for a wide viewable area. Antifog coating helps keep your optics clear and precise; hardened surface resists scratches. Lens vents help control airflow and deter fogging. Tough, injection-molded thermopolyurethane frame supplies a comfortable fit that remains flexible in frigid conditions. 3-layer face foam is topped with soft fleece to offer next-to-skin comfort and a snug face seal. Von Zipper Feenom snow goggles have a silicone-backed, dual-adjustable strap and helmet-compatible design for a comfortable, personalized and precise fit.
short_description: With a cylindrical lens for great peripheral vision, the Von Zipper Feenom snow goggles offer style and performance for your epic days on the mountain.
